[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genesislcap/foundation-comms](./foundation-comms.md) &gt; [CredentialManager](./foundation-comms.credentialmanager.md) &gt; [storeCredentialsInContainer](./foundation-comms.credentialmanager.storecredentialsincontainer.md)

## CredentialManager.storeCredentialsInContainer() method

Stores the specified credential data in the browser's credential manager.

**Signature:**

```typescript
storeCredentialsInContainer(data: CredentialData): Promise<Credential | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | [CredentialData](./foundation-comms.credentialdata_2.md) | The credential data to store. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Credential \| undefined&gt;

A Promise that resolves to the stored credential object, or `undefined` if storage fails.
